hero.description: Your name will echo through the ages. Join the Nocturnal Legacy and become part of a family whose legends will be told for generations. Your story starts here.

about.title: About Nocturnal Legacy
about.p1: Born from the ashes of countless battles, Nocturnal Legacy emerged as a beacon of hope in the chaotic world of Rise of Kingdoms. What began as a small group of determined warriors has evolved into a legendary family that commands respect across the battlefield.
about.p2: Our story is one of unbreakable bonds, strategic brilliance, and unwavering loyalty. We've faced the mightiest kingdoms and emerged victorious, not through sheer force, but through the power of unity and tactical excellence.
about.p3: Today, we stand as a testament to what can be achieved when individual strength combines with collective purpose. We are not just warriors—we are a family forged in fire.
about.leadershipSubtitle: Commanders whose wisdom and experience guide our family to victory

pryda.title: Supreme Leader of Nocturnal Legacy
pryda.desc: Head of the entire Nocturnal Legacy family. Oversees strategy, structure, and all final decisions.

verso.name: Verso
verso.title: Chief Advisor of Nocturnal Legacy
verso.desc: Manages external diplomacy and alliance relations. Also responsible for territory planning in KVK and home kingdom, working closely with territory officers across the family.

leaders.allianceSubtitle: Elite leaders who guide our specialized forces

oldmanchewy.desc: Leads the Blades alliance. Key decision-maker in family-wide leadership and war planning.

suad.desc: Acts under Pryda's direct command. Executes high-priority tasks with loyalty and precision.

nox.name: Nox
nox.desc: Supports Chewy in operations and event execution. Fully involved in leadership decisions across the family.

draculla.name: Draculla
draculla.desc: Oversees all alliances during events, tracks performance, gives strategic support, and ensures the whole family pushes together for top rankings and rewards.

nyx.name: Nyx
nyx.desc: Monitors all alliances for rule-breaking or internal issues. Maintains order and reports to leadership.

pyhrex.name: Pyhrex
pyhrex.desc: Executes flag placement and tech planning for the family under Verso's coordination. Key role in war prep, territory control and research efficiency.

eliteAlliances.title: Our Elite Alliances
eliteAlliances.subtitle: Two legendary alliances working in perfect harmony to dominate kingdoms and create an unstoppable force

knights.title: Nocturnal Knights
knights.desc: The unbreakable shield of our family. These legendary defenders have mastered the art of protecting what matters most. Their cities stand as impenetrable fortresses, their resources flow like rivers, and their support keeps the entire family strong.

blades.title: Nocturnal Blades
blades.desc: The relentless sword of our family. These legendary warriors strike with unmatched precision and courage. Their victories inspire the family, their tactics shape our destiny, and their unity forges our path to greatness.

familyCulture.title: Our Family Culture
familyCulture.description: Beyond the battlefield, Nocturnal Legacy is built on values that create lasting bonds and legendary achievements. Our culture is the foundation of our success and the reason we remain undefeated.

values.unityDescription: We believe that individual strength is amplified when combined with collective purpose. Every member contributes to our shared success.
values.strategyDescription: Every battle is won before it begins. We value strategic thinking, careful planning, and tactical execution over brute force.
values.excellenceDescription: We strive for excellence in everything we do. From individual performance to alliance coordination, we never settle for anything less than the best.

answerCall.title: Answer the Call
answerCall.subtitle: Ready to Join the Elite?
answerCall.description: Are you ready to become part of something greater than yourself? Nocturnal Legacy seeks warriors who value loyalty, strategy, and family above all else.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about joining the legendary Nocturnal Legacy family

questions.q: What if I don't meet the power requirement?
questions.a: We consider exceptional players on a case-by-case basis. Contact our leaders to discuss your situation and potential exceptions.

questions.q: How long is the trial period?
questions.a: Trial periods typically last 1-2 weeks, depending on your activity level and integration with the family.

questions.q: Do I need to leave my current alliance?
questions.a: Yes, you'll need to leave your current alliance before joining ours. We'll guide you through the process.

questions.q: What if I can't be active daily?
questions.a: We understand real life comes first. Just communicate with leadership about any absences and maintain reasonable activity levels.

questions.q: Can I choose which alliance to join?
questions.a: Leadership will recommend the best alliance based on your playstyle and our current needs.
You can reapply after 30 days. Use the feedback to improve and try again.
Yes, Discord is required for communication, coordination, and staying updated with family events.

questions.q: What are the benefits of joining?
questions.a: Elite protection, strategic warfare training, resource abundance, constant victories, active community, and personalized support.

join.requirementsSubtitle: What we look for in potential members

combat.title: Combat Experience
combat.desc: Minimum 50M power with proven battle experience. We value quality over quantity.

active.title: Active Participation
active.desc: Daily activity required. We need warriors who are committed to our cause.

team.title: Team Player
team.desc: Must work well with others and follow leadership directives without question.

loyalty.title: Loyalty
loyalty.desc: Unwavering loyalty to the family. No previous betrayals or dishonorable conduct.

communication.title: Communication
communication.desc: Must join Discord and maintain active communication with the family.

resources.title: Resource Sharing
resources.desc: Willing to contribute to family support and resource distribution programs.

steps.title: Contact Leadership
steps.desc: Reach out to our leaders through Discord or in-game chat to express your interest

steps.title: Initial Interview
steps.desc: Complete a brief interview to discuss your experience and commitment level

steps.title: Trial Period
steps.desc: Join as a trial member for 1-2 weeks to prove your worth and commitment

steps.title: Full Membership
steps.desc: Upon approval, receive full membership benefits and access to all family resources
